title: Supreme Court (Number of Judges) Act, 1997
description: Official consolidated text of Supreme Court (Number of Judges) Act, 1997 (XXXIII of 1997) published by The Pakistan Code (Departmental Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement.⸻(1) This Act may be called the Supreme Court (Number
provisions.content:
of Judges) Act, 1997.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
1
[2. Maximum number of Supreme Court Judges other than Chief Justice.⸻ The
maximum number of Judges of the Supreme Court of Pakistan other than the Chief Justice shall be up
to thirty-three.]
_________
1
Subs. by Act No. XXX of 2024, s.2.
